featured.text: It was issued by the king of Judah.
The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.

definition.zh_def: 猶大，古代以色列的十二支派之一，通常指猶太人的祖先或猶太地區。
definition.en_def: Judah, one of the twelve tribes of ancient Israel, often referring to the ancestor of the Jewish people or the region of Judea.
definition.example: Judah was known for its strong leadership and rich heritage.
